thread.title: Blac Chyna Gets Future's Name Tattooed on Her Hand
thread.title_full: Blac Chyna Gets Future's Name Tattooed on Her Hand

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Blac Chyna Gets Future's Name Tattooed on Her Hand
text:
Comments The 27-year-old model shares a photo of her hand being tattooed with the word 'Future' amidst dating rumors with the rapper of the same name. 
Blac Chyna may have inked her rumored boyfriend Future 's name on her hand. Blac took to Instagram on Sunday, October 25 to share a photo of her fresh new ink which featured the word "Future" on the side of her right palm. "Thought it was a drought," the 27-year-old model captioned the picture, referencing the title of one of Future's songs from his new album " DS2 ". She donned a black top paired with white ripped jeans and sneakers. A photo posted by www.Lashedbar.co (@blacchyna) on Oct 25, 2015 at 11:55am PDT Dating rumors between Blac and Future began swirling after she was spotted on the set of his music video "Stick Talk" earlier this month. The rumored couple has been spotted together numerous times over the past few weeks though neither has confirmed about their romance. To further the speculation, Blac posted the picture of the tattoo on the same day Future's ex Ciara celebrated her birthday. Some people on social media even suggested that Tyga 's baby mama got the tattoo two weeks ago and waited to share the picture until now. She posted a photo of her visit to tattoo parlor earlier this month. A photo posted by www.Lashedbar.co (@blacchyna) on Oct 5, 2015 at 7:30pm PDT
